connect20/quickpay_payment_3.name: connect20/Quickpay_Payment_3

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/quickpay_payment_3.description:
A payment method that allows your customers to pay their orders with creditcards.
The extension even allows you to capture and refund amount directly from your backend as you create your invoices and creditmemo's.
